  Validate that provided CIDR blocks do not overlap.

# function: cidr_overlap

Returns true when none of the provided CIDR blocks overlap. Fails with an error when overlap is detected.

## Example Usage

```terraform
locals {
  cidr_overlap_checks = {
    non_overlap = provider::validatefx::cidr_overlap(["10.0.0.0/24", "10.0.1.0/24"])
  }
}

output "cidr_overlap" {
  value = local.cidr_overlap_checks
}
```

## Signature

<!-- signature generated by tfplugindocs -->
```text
cidr_overlap(cidrs list of string) bool
```

## Arguments

<!-- arguments generated by tfplugindocs -->
1. `cidrs` (List of String, Nullable) List of CIDR blocks to check for overlap.
